title: Login not working
description: User reports unable to login with correct credentials.

title: UI overlap on mobile
description: Buttons overlap on small screens in checkout page.

title: Profile image upload error
description: Image fails to upload for some JPG files.

title: Notifications delay
description: Push notifications sometimes delayed by minutes.

title: Password reset link expired
description: Reset links expire immediately for some users.

title: Search results incorrect
description: Search returns unrelated results for query.

title: Slow dashboard load
description: Dashboard takes long time to load for power users.

title: CSV export formatting
description: Exported CSV contains extra quotes and broken headers.

title: Two-factor auth not sending code
description: Some users not receiving SMS code for 2FA.
